wikipedia_page.main: Nick Ramsay (born 10 June 1975) is a British politician who was a Member of the Senedd between 2007 and 2021. He formerly represented the constituency of Monmouth. He was Shadow Minister of Finance under Conservative Leader in the Senedd, Paul Davies MS, but lost the position in Jan 2021 under the new leadership of Andrew RT Davies. Ramsay sat as an Independent member before seeking re-election as an Independent in the 2021 Senedd election.
